title: Mini-Ep 127: Quaran-Kat and Dor-entine
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 127: Quaran-Kat and Dor-entine
itunes:subtitle: Kate hits her pandemic wall and Doree thanks the GTJBI Facebook Group for a prod rec they knocked out of the park.
description:
Kate hits her pandemic wall and Doree thanks the Gee, Thanks Just Bought It Facebook Group for a prod rec they knocked out of the park. Then they suggest easy makeup for a listener’s (socially-distanced) wedding, hear a response to the teacher who is torn about returning to school, and discuss a very casual poop text.


Activity of the Day: Listen to the new Alanis Morissette album. 


Visit our website, Forever35Podcast.com, for links to everything we mention on the show. And follow us on Twitter and Instagram and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). Join the Gee, Thanks FB group at http://www.facebook.com/groups/geethanks.


To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


And please take our listener survey: http://www.survey.fan/forever35. It really helps the show!


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

 

THRIVE MARKET -  Join today at thrivemarket.com/forever35 and you’ll get a FREE gift of your choosing, up to 22 dollars in value..
